title: Jack Daniel's logo
content:
![jack daniel's logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225642im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/62816.gif)   
   
Does anyone know what font is used in the Jack Daniels logo? Is there a knock-off font?
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Jack Daniels has come up several times before, and the   
only thing we could find up till now was [FF Jackie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225642/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=16&displayfontid=FF.11393.0.0&fontRendererText=Tennessee) for the   
"Tennessee" bit.
